post.body: If you go there...what do you think about it? Any sort of info is apperciated. thanks

they have a kick-ass football team and its one of the largest student populated colleges in the country. you probably already knew that but my parents are alums so i try to follow everything that i can. oh yeah, A&M sucks monkey balls. k done now
a&m sucks and they are imbred hicks....hook em horns
Thanks... Do you know anything about the school of Liberal Arts?

my best friend goes to UT austin. i visit her a lot up there. she has some likes and dislikes about it. however, it all depends on what u want to study. some schools have better programs in different things than other schools...like u of houston (go coogs!) we have a really good psychology program and music program...and business...texas southern (right across from us) has a really good pharmacy program.

UT is an awesome school. I miss the long walks to class & the bus rides. (I really do! haha) I had a great time while I was in Austin... coffee shops, live shows, football, & Leslie! I didn't enjoy it as much as I would've liked towards the end (b/c of work/studying), but I would definitely recommend it. I hope to move back to Austin in a couple years. Can't wait!
UT is great, I never got to go there, but i lived in Austin for a while, and I have buddies that go there, If you like to party and get an education, check it out. HOOK EM HORNS!
